body_html:
Hi @abdurrehman1998

Yes, this tutorial is using fashion-mnist, this comment is left-over from an earlier version.

The source file for this tutorial is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/samples/core/tutorials/keras/basic_classification.ipynb

Can you send me a PR with a fix?
The easiest way to do it is to edit in Colab and use the "save a copy to github" option.

Thanks!

body:
Hi @abdurrehman1998 

Yes, this tutorial is using fashion-mnist, this comment is left-over from an earlier version.

The source file for this tutorial is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/samples/core/tutorials/keras/basic_classification.ipynb

Can you send me a PR with a fix?
The easiest way to do it is to edit in Colab and use the "save a copy to github" option.
